short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You never have to watch a page jumping around to load again. Enjoy watching fancy loaders while your page loads in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Choose what websites you allow to show the loader on and block others.
Choose your preferred loader style and colors, and sync it to your google account to take your customizations to all browsers that you are logged to.
